panel.title: Ingest by source in Gb / Day

search.query: index="_internal" host=* source="*/metrics.log" group=per_sourcetype_thruput | eval gb=kb/1024/1024 | stats sum(gb) AS total_gb, sum(ev) AS total_events by series | sort - total_gb
index="_internal" host=* source="*/metrics.log" group=per_sourcetype_thruput | eval gb=kb/1024/1024 | stats sum(gb) AS total_gb

index=_internal source=*license_usage.log TERM(type=Usage) earliest=-7d@d latest=@d | fields idx, b, st, h, _time, date_wday | eval h=if(len(h)=0 OR isnull(h),'(SQUASHED)',h) | bin _time span=1d | stats sum(b) AS b, dc(h) AS h by st idx _time | stats avg(b) as avg_b, avg(h) AS Host_Count_per_Day by idx st | eval Avg_MB_per_Day=round(avg_b/1024/1024,2) | eval Avg_GB_per_Day=round(avg_b/1024/1024/1024,2) | eval Avg_MB_per_Host=round(Avg_MB_per_Day/Host_Count_per_Day,2) | eval Host_Count_per_Day=round(Host_Count_per_Day,0) | rename st AS Sourcetype | join type=left Sourcetype [ | rest /services/saved/sourcetypes | rename title AS Sourcetype, eai:acl.app as app | table Sourcetype, app ] | table idx, app, Sourcetype, Avg_MB_per_Day, Avg_GB_per_Day, Host_Count_per_Day, Avg_MB_per_Host | sort -Avg_MB_per_Da

(host=sh*.*splunk*.* OR host=si*.*splunk*.*) index=_audit action=search sourcetype=audittrail | eval user = if(user="n/a", null(), user) | eval search_type = case( match(search_id, "^SummaryDirector_"), "summarization", match(savedsearch_name, "^_ACCELERATE_"), "acceleration", match(search_id, "^((rt_)?scheduler_|alertsmanager_)"), "scheduled", match(search_id, "\d{10}\.\d+(_[0-9A-F]{8}-[0-9A-F]{4}-[0-9A-F]{4}-[0-9A-F]{4}-[0-9A-F]{12})?$$"), "ad hoc", savedsearch_name="","ad hoc", true(), "other") | eval search_type=case( match(savedsearch_name,"search\d"),"dashboard", match(search_id,"rt_*"),"realtime", match(search_id,"subsearch_*"),"subsearch", true(),search_type) | eval search=if(isnull(savedsearch_name) OR savedsearch_name=="", search, savedsearch_name) | stats min(_time) as _time, values(user) as user, max(total_run_time) as total_run_time, first(search) as search, first(search_type) as search_type, first(search_et) as search_et, first(search_lt) as search_lt, first(api_et) as api_et, first(api_lt) as api_lt by search_id, host | where search_type=="ad hoc" AND isnotnull(search) AND isnotnull(user) | eval api_et = if(api_et="N/A", search_et, api_et) | eval api_lt = if(api_lt="N/A", search_lt, api_lt) | eval earliest=if(api_et="N/A", "AllTime", strftime(api_et, "%Y-%d-%m %H:%M:%S")) | eval latest=if(api_lt="N/A", "AllTime", strftime(api_lt, "%Y-%d-%m %H:%M:%S")) | eval _time = strftime(_time, "%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S %z") | stats max(total_run_time) as total_run_time by search, search_type, user, host, search_id | search total_run_time > 1800 | sort - total_run_time | stats count as Searches

(host=sh*.*splunk*.* OR host=si*.*splunk*.*) NOT user IN(cmon_user,internal_observability) index=_audit action=search sourcetype=audittrail | eval user = if(user="n/a", null(), user) | eval search_type = case( match(search_id, "^SummaryDirector_"), "summarization", match(savedsearch_name, "^_ACCELERATE_"), "acceleration", match(search_id, "^((rt_)?scheduler_|alertsmanager_)"), "scheduled", match(search_id, "\d{10}\.\d+(_[0-9A-F]{8}-[0-9A-F]{4}-[0-9A-F]{4}-[0-9A-F]{4}-[0-9A-F]{12})?$$"), "ad hoc", savedsearch_name="","ad hoc", true(), "other") | eval search_type=case( match(savedsearch_name,"search\d"),"dashboard", match(search_id,"rt_*"),"realtime", match(search_id,"subsearch_*"),"subsearch", true(),search_type) | eval search=if(isnull(savedsearch_name) OR savedsearch_name=="", search, savedsearch_name) | stats sum(total_run_time) as total_run_time | rename total_run_time as "Search Runtime" | stats sum("Search Runtime") as sum | eval "TotalSearchRuntime" = case( round('sum' / (3600*24) - 0.5) > 0, round('sum' / (3600*24) - 0.5)."d ".round(('sum' % (3600*24)) / 3600 - 0.5)."h ".round(('sum' % 3600) / 60 - 0.5)."min ".round('sum' % 60, 2)."s", round(('sum' % (3600*24)) / 3600 - 0.5) > 0, round(('sum' % (3600*24)) / 3600 - 0.5)."h ".round(('sum' % 3600) / 60 - 0.5)."min ".round('sum' % 60, 2)."s", round(('sum' % 3600) / 60 - 0.5) > 0, round(('sum' % 3600) / 60 - 0.5)."min ".round('sum' % 60, 2)."s", 1 = 1, round('sum' % 60, 2)."s" ) | table TotalSearchRuntime | eval TotalSearchRuntime=substr(TotalSearchRuntime,1,09)

(host=sh*.*splunk*.* OR host=si*.*splunk*.*) index=_audit action=search sourcetype=audittrail | eval user = if(user="n/a", null(), user) | eval search_type = case( match(search_id, "^SummaryDirector_"), "summarization", match(savedsearch_name, "^_ACCELERATE_"), "acceleration", match(search_id, "^((rt_)?scheduler_|alertsmanager_)"), "scheduled", match(search_id, "d{10}.d+(_[0-9A-F]{8}-[0-9A-F]{4}-[0-9A-F]{4}-[0-9A-F]{4}-[0-9A-F]{12})?$$"), "ad hoc", savedsearch_name="","ad hoc", true(), "other") | eval search_type=case( match(savedsearch_name,"searchd"),"dashboard", match(search_id,"rt_*"),"realtime", match(search_id,"subsearch_*"),"subsearch", true(),search_type) | eval search=if(isnull(savedsearch_name) OR savedsearch_name=="", search, savedsearch_name) | timechart count by search_type
| tstats values(sourcetype) where index=* by index | rename index AS "Index", values(sourcetype) AS "Source Types"

panel.title: Most recent received sourcetype in this Environment

search.query: | tstats latest(_time) as latesttime where index=* by sourcetype | eval fixedtime = strftime(latesttime,"%c") | table sourcetype, fixedtime | rename sourcetype AS "Source Type", fixedtime AS "Time (Last Event Received)"
index=_audit host=* sourcetype=audittrail action=search info=completed savedsearch_name="*Rule" | stats dc(savedsearch_name) as correlation_search_count

index=_audit host=* sourcetype=audittrail action=search info=completed savedsearch_name!=*_ACCELERATE_* savedsearch_name!="" savedsearch_name!="*Rule" savedsearch_id="*SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite*" | stats dc(savedsearch_name) as built_in_saved_search_count

index=_audit host=* sourcetype=audittrail action=search info=completed savedsearch_name!=*_ACCELERATE_* savedsearch_name!="" savedsearch_name!="*Rule" savedsearch_id!="*SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite*" | stats dc(savedsearch_name) as user_defined_saved_search_count

panel.title: Splunk Core Search workload (non-ES search head(s))

search.query: index=_audit host=* action=search sourcetype=audittrail search_id!="*rsa_*" search_id!="*subsearch*" | stats dc(search_id) as "Daily Search Count"

index=_audit host=* sourcetype=audittrail action=search info=completed savedsearch_name="" search_id!="*_scheduler_*" search_id!="*_summarize_*" search_id!="*SummaryDirector*" search_id!='subsearch_*' | stats count as ad_hoc_search
| tstats count GroupBy host sourcetype index _time span=1d | eval entity = host . "/" . sourcetype . "/" . index | timechart span=1d sum(count) BY entity

panel.title: EPS [Useful for UBA sizing or others]

search.query: | tstats count as eps where index=* groupby index, sourcetype _time span=1s | stats count as NumSeconds max(eps) perc99(eps) perc90(eps) avg(eps) as avg_eps by index, sourcetype | addinfo | eval PercentageOfTimeWithData = NumSeconds / (info_max_time - info_min_time) | fields - NumSeconds info | eval EffectiveAverage = avg_eps * PercentageOfTimeWithData | fieldformat PercentageOfTimeWithData = round(PercentageOfTimeWithData*100,2)

panel.title: Daily license usage by sourcetype using the metrics throughput log over 30 days

search.query: index=_internal earliest=@day-30days latest=@day source=*metrics.log splunk_server="*" group="per_sourcetype_thruput" series!="stash" | bin _time span=1d | stats sum(kb) AS kb,sum(ev) AS events by series,_time | stats avg(kb) AS kb,avg(events) AS Events by series | rename series as sourcetype | eval MB=round(kb/1024,2) | sort MB | join sourcetype [| tstats count WHERE earliest=@day-30days latest=@day index=* AND index!="_*" GROUPBY sourcetype,host _time span=1d | stats dc(host) as Hosts by sourcetype,_time | stats avg(Hosts) as Hosts by sourcetype | eval sourcetype=lower(sourcetype), Hosts=round(Hosts,0) ] | addcoltotals | fillnull value="[ Total Indexed Volume ] per 24 Hours" sourcetype | eval MBPerHost=round(MB/Hosts,0) | eval EPS=round(Events/(24*60*60),1) | eval MessageSize=round(kb*1024/Events,0) | fields - kb
